resources.string: Skilled web and android application developer with 4 years of experience in a hands-on development environment focused on both internal and external client software projects. Strong contributor to the software development lifecycle, with involvement in requirements, design, programming, testing, and implementation.

Software Engineering • Web Application Development • Android Application Development • Requirements Gathering and Analysis • Application Modeling • Business Logic Development • Software Testing and Debugging
Master of Science in Computer Science (Running)
Maharishi University of Management, Fairfield, Iowa
Bachelor of Computer Science and Engineering (2016)
HMS Institute of Technology, Bangalore, Karnataka, India
Nepal Softech College of Computer Engineering, Nepal
One of Nepal’s top innovators in information technology, focused on technology for the travel industry.
Contributed to the software development lifecycle in an Agile environment for web applications development.
One of Nepal’s largest software development companies.

C#, JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, ASP.NET MVC 5, Angular, jQuery, Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS 3, JSON, AJAX, SQL Server 2014, MySQL, NoSQL, MongoDB, Microsoft Visual Studio 2015, Microsoft SQL Server, GitHub, Microsoft Windows
